entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
